content: PHBO's first two months in office: Close GTMO with possibility of releasing enemy combatants into the USA. Drops the terms "enemy combatants, terrorists, terrorism, war on terror, etc.," as not being politically correct enough. Offers to drop missile shield so that our EU position is greatly weakened, and Russia's is greatly strengthened. Pays Hamas 900 million to keep killing Israelis (only an idiot would believe they will be spending the money on education). Wants to talk and play nice with Iran's Imanutjob, the same guy who was a hostage taker in the Carter days. Raises debt more than all previous Presidents combined, and is only just getting warmed up. Lied about 5 day public viewing of Stimulus bill. Lied about no earmarks in Stimulus bill. Lied about it even being a "Stimulus" bill. Thanked himself in a speech. Is on record as wanting to create his own civilian armed forces. Paid ACORN 4 billion of taxpayer money for services rendered. Wants to demand by law "voluntary" service of all children. Wants to cap and trade and kill the energy industry. Wants to legitimize illegal aliens, thus ensuring Democrats rule for just about forever. Gives "wrong region" DVDS to England's PM. Sent Hillary to Russia with a 'reset button' that really said overcharge in Russian. Disses the Special Olympics on the Jay Leno show. Nominates tax cheat after tax cheat for cabinet positions. "Didn't know" about the AIG bonuses. Compared AIG to suicide bombers. Created the environment for the stock market plunge, and the destruction of small businesses. "The World's Finest"

Remeber, we're not fighting Russia and the missile shield was again Iran and the shield isn't again a lot of missiles like Russia has, but again a country like Iran or Pakistan or India. or N.Korea who only have a few missiles and might be tempted to take a shot at our EU allies. Let's you look at bills and such. Easy, not hard at all. American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 (stimulus bill) Comm. Vote House votes Comm. Vote Senate Votes H1 1/21/09 1/28/09 S336 1/27/09 2/10/09 <7 days> rc <14 days> 111-3 rc S.Amdt.570 Lied about no earmarks in Stimulus bill. Proof? Or just you interpretation? Sent Hillary to Russia with a 'reset button' that really said overcharge in Russian. Disses the Special Olympics on the Jay Leno show. Nominates tax cheat after tax cheat for cabinet positions. "Didn't know" about the AIG bonuses. Compared AIG to suicide bombers. Created the environment for the stock market plunge, and the destruction of small businesses. Proof? Or just you interpretation? Gads, is that all you can complain about, we librals had Pres. Bush going to war with the wrong people, spying on Americans, claiming phantom WMDs. dropping our approvel ratings with the rest of the world and our allies to a new, all time low. And the number of times both he and his crew of neo-con, couldn't remeber anythig when asked about it... too many to count.
